alert.note: Alert for Madison; Northern Oneida; Otsego; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 9:10PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT ONEIDA...NORTH CENTRAL OTSEGO AND SOUTHEASTERN MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM EDT... At 910 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Waterville, or 8 miles south of New Hartford, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Utica, Rome, Kirkland, Westmoreland, Eaton, Trenton, Paris, Deerfield, Hamilton, and Floyd. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 31 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Madison; Northern Oneida; Otsego; Southern Oneida
